description: Subjects a strategy dossier to a rigorous, multi-stage vetting process to identify flaws, biases, and unforeseen consequences before finalization.

strategy_dossier.description: The strategic dossier generated in a previous phase.

problem_description.description: The original problem description for context.

session_id.description: The unique ID of the session.

red_team_analysis.description: Simulates a 'Red Team' to adversarially critique the strategy and identify potential weaknesses.

ethical_and_bias_review.description: Analyzes the strategy for ethical implications, hidden biases, and potential negative second-order effects.

dystopian_simulation.description: Simulates the worst-case, dystopian outcome if the strategy were implemented and failed catastrophically.

synthesize_vetting_dossier.description: Combines all vetting reports into a single, comprehensive vetting dossier.

generate_final_strategy.description: Refines the original strategy based on the vetting dossier, mitigating identified risks.

final_strategy.description: The final, vetted, and refined strategy. May include a rejection notice if risks are unacceptable.

vetting_dossier.description: The complete dossier of all analysis performed during the vetting process.
